property.name: poolsName
property.formula: (SELECT pool.poolName FROM cmdb_server_pools2host pool WHERE pool.id = phostId)

property.name: hosts
property.formula: (SELECT count(*) from cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host where host.clousterId = id)

property.name: vms
property.formula: (SELECT sum(host.vms) FROM cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host WHERE host.clousterId = id)

property.name: cpus
property.formula: (SELECT sum(host.cpus) FROM cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host WHERE host.clousterId = id)

property.name: memorys
property.formula: (SELECT sum(host.ram) FROM cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host WHERE host.clousterId = id)

property.name: assignMem
property.formula: (select sum(vm.memory) from cmdb_cloud_server2vm vm where vm.hostid in (select ove.id from cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow ove where ove.clousterid = id))

property.name: memUsage
property.formula: ((select sum(vm.memory) from cmdb_cloud_server2vm vm where vm.hostid in (select ove.id from cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow ove where ove.clousterid = id))*100.0/(SELECT sum(host.ram) FROM cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host WHERE host.clousterId = id))

property.name: assignCpu
property.formula: (select sum(vm.cpu) from cmdb_cloud_server2vm vm where vm.hostid in (select ove.id from cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow ove where ove.clousterid = id))

property.name: cpuUsage
property.formula: ((select sum(vm.cpu) from cmdb_cloud_server2vm vm where vm.hostid in (select ove.id from cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow ove where ove.clousterid = id))*100.0/(SELECT sum(host.cpus) FROM cmdb_cap_server2ovelflow host WHERE host.clousterId = id))
